entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is hiding his presents and birthday cards under the loose floorboard.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's owl, who is being asked to leave with Errol for a week.

entities.name: errol
entities.description: Another owl in Harry's care, who seems to have recovered from an illness.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who will look after Hedwig while Harry is away.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who will accompany Ron to Hogsmeade.

entities.name: hogsmeade
entities.description: A village where Harry wants to visit with Ron and Hermione.

relationships.description: Harry is asking Hedwig to leave with Errol for a week.

Harry and Hermione are friends, and she will accompany Ron to Hogsmeade.

Harry wants to visit Hogsmeade with Ron and Hermione.
